Headline: Green Line Delays
ShortDescription: Green Line trains are running w/residual delays and congestion following earlier fire department activity near Laramie

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Green Line trains are running w/residual delays and congestion following earlier fire department activity near Laramie. Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored. Allow extra travel time.
